column5: the body of a man was found floating in the sea off Koh Rong.------The victim
column7: was a 38-year-old boat worker from Sangkat 3
column9: Preah Sihanouk province. He was declared missing on ------February 22
column10: after his boat sank------. Five people were rescued.------The body was taken to the mainland and will be handed over to the family for a traditional funeral.------ POST NEWS
